title: When time does the weekend game mode come out today?
body: what does the game mode come out? It's 2:09 it usually comes out at 2:00 I'm EST

replies.body: Rotating game modes usually activates on Friday afternoons and roughly ends on Monday.  Check out our schedule and more information at our [Game modes ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210354503-Rotating-Game-Modes-FAQ)guide!  Hope that helps clear things up, and have fun with this week's events!
